name: Lucid (itch) (KarimAjouz)
description:
Lucid is an experiential game about struggling with escapism, seeking the high of forgoing our responsibilities, even if only for a fleeting moment.

 - Press Escape to quit.

 - Standard WASD controls.

Special Thanks to:

- Joao Paulo for free use of the brick texture: https://www.patreon.com/bePatron?c=158505

- Aligned Games for free use of their low-poly trees and bushes asset pack: https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/18851

Music and all remaining assets are my own, mostly created in Asset Forge 2: https://assetforge.io/
